raw: Mick McCarthy ’s second stint as Ireland manager ended on Saturday as the country ’s football association ( FAI ) announced he was being immediately replaced by Stephen Kenny .
replaced: McCarthy ’s second stint as Ireland manager ended on Saturday as the FAI announced McCarthy was being immediately replaced by Kenny .

raw: Former Ireland defender McCarthy , 61 , took over in November 2018 and was poised to lead them into last month ’s Euro 2020 qualifying playoffs before the coronavirus pandemic took hold .
replaced: McCarthy  Ireland defender McCarthy , 61 , took over in November 2018 and was poised to lead them into last month ’s Euro 2020 qualifying playoffs before the COVID-19 pandemic took hold .

raw: Ex - Dundalk manager Kenny was due to replace McCarthy after the Euros but with the playoffs delayed and the tournament put back a year the FAI have brought the transition forward .
replaced: Kenny was due to replace McCarthy after the Euros but with last month ’s Euro 2020 qualifying playoffs delayed and the tournament put back a year the FAI have brought the transition forward .

raw: “ The Football Association of Ireland announces that Mick McCarthy is to be succeeded as national team manager by Stephen Kenny with immediate effect , ” a statement read .
replaced: “ The Football Association of Ireland This move that McCarthy is to be The handover as national team manager by Kenny with immediate effect , ” the statement read .

raw: “ The handover has been agreed with both men in light of the delay to the European Championship play - offs caused by the COVID-19 pandemic . ”
replaced: “ The handover has been agreed with both men in light of the delay to the European Championship play - offs caused by the COVID-19 pandemic . ”

raw: McCarthy ’s contract was due to expire on July 31 , after the Euro 2020 finals that have now been re - scheduled for 2021 .
replaced: McCarthy ’s contract was due to expire on July 31 , after the Euro 2020 finals that have now been re - scheduled for 2021 .

raw: “ This move allows Stephen Kenny time to plan for the European Championship play - off semi - final against Slovakia later in the year , ” the statement said .
replaced: “ This move allows Kenny time to plan for the European Championship play - off semi - final against Slovakia later in the year , ” the statement said .

raw: Kenny , 48 , has been promoted from under-21s coach .
